backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the backend canister with types for Disease and Animal, and functions to add/retrieve diseases and animals, plus a checkSymptoms query that filters diseases by species and matches symptoms.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five camera-related features (capture button, photo storage, thumbnail display, full-size display, and permission handling) with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files including components, hooks, pages, types, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining an earth-tone OKLCH color system for light and dark modes, including primary, secondary, accent, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, page title 'Animal Disease Detection App', and a root div that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component setting up TanStack Router with three routes (dashboard at '/', detection at '/detect', results at '/results') all wrapped in a Layout component.
frontend/src/components/AnimalSymptomFor: Form component with species selector, breed/age inputs, symptoms textarea, and integrated CameraCapture component that validates input, calls checkSymptoms mutation, saves detection with optional photo to history, and navigates to results page.
frontend/src/components/CameraCapture.ts: Camera capture component using useCamera hook that opens a dialog with video preview, handles camera permissions and errors, provides capture/switch/retry controls, converts captured photos to base64 data URLs, and shows mobile-specific UI elements.
frontend/src/components/DashboardStats.t: Displays three stat cards showing total detections, common species, and common diseases with icons and counts from HistoryStats data.
frontend/src/components/DetectionHistory: Renders a clickable card for a single detection record showing thumbnail/icon, species/breed info, timestamp, and top detected disease with badge.
frontend/src/components/DiseaseResultCar: Displays detailed disease information including severity badge, affected species, symptom checklist with matched symptoms highlighted, and treatment advice.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with sticky header containing logo and navigation links (Dashboard/New Detection), main content area, and footer with branding and social links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDetectionHistory.t: Manages detection history in localStorage with photo compression (max 500KB), provides addDetection function and getStats for aggregating species/disease counts.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for checking symptoms, adding diseases, and fetching disease data from the backend actor, with automatic query invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom earth-tone color palette (greens, browns, oranges) for light and dark modes, plus base typography and utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page displaying detection statistics and history list with navigation to new detections and past results.
frontend/src/pages/DetectionPage.tsx: Main detection page with feature highlights (instant analysis, accuracy, care advice) and the animal symptom input form.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Results page showing detection outcomes including animal photo, reported symptoms, matched symptoms, and potential diseases with treatment advice.
frontend/src/types/detection.ts: TypeScript interfaces for detection records (with animal details, symptoms, photo, and results) and history statistics.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom OKLCH color system, border radius variables, shadows, Inter font, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features (form input, results display, dashboard, camera capture, photo storage) and pending AI/ML integration requirements.
